item.title: 班克曼-弗里德的前女友埃里森敦促法官免除她因 FTX 欺诈案入狱的处罚
item.description: 前加密货币高管卡罗琳-埃里森（Caroline Ellison）因参与盗窃山姆-班克曼-弗里德（Sam Bankman-Fried）破产的 FTX 交易所客户的 80 亿美元而认罪，她敦促联邦法官不要将她送进监狱。【原文：Former cryptocurrency executive Caroline Ellison urged a federal judge not to send her to prison after she pleaded guilty over her role in the theft of $8 billion from customers of Sam Bankman-Fried's bankrupt FTX exchange.】

item.title: 商业团体担心政治压力影响美国对日本的审查
item.description: 一些美国商业团体周三发出警报，称拜登政府对新日铁公司计划斥资 149 亿美元收购美国钢铁公司的国家安全审查受到了政治压力的不当影响。【原文：A number of U.S. business groups on Wednesday sounded the alarm that the Biden administration's national security review of Nippon Steel's planned $14.9 billion acquisition of U.S. Steel is being unduly influenced by political pressure.】

item.title: 美国邮政局将终止对包裹合并商的折扣费率优惠
item.description: 美国邮政服务公司（U.S. Postal Service）周三表示，它将不再为合并者输入的包裹提供折扣价，这是其网络现代化的广泛努力的一部分。【原文：The U.S. Postal Service said Wednesday it will no longer offer discounted rates for packages entered by consolidators, part of a wide ranging effort to modernize its network.】

item.title: 弗朗辛来袭，路易斯安那州重要能源港口暂停运营
item.description: 据一份航运公告称，由于飓风 "弗朗辛"（Francine）向海岸线袭来，美国海岸警卫队周三暂停了路易斯安那州海上能源服务枢纽富尔雄港（Port Fourchon）的作业。【原文：The U.S Coast Guard on Wednesday suspended operations at the offshore energy services hub Port Fourchon, Louisiana, as hurricane Francine bore down on the coast, according to a shipping advisory.】

item.title: 智利 Codelco 公司 7 月份铜产量下滑近 11
item.description: 南美国家 Cochilco 铜业委员会周三宣布，智利国营矿商 Codelco [RIC:RIC:COBRE.UL] 7 月份的铜产量为 11.14 万吨，同比下降 10.7%，而其他主要矿商的业绩则喜忧参半。【原文：Chile state miner Codelco [RIC:RIC:COBRE.UL] produced 111,400 metric tons of copper in July, down 10.7% from a year earlier, the South American country's Cochilco copper commission announced on Wednesday, while other key miners saw mixed results.】

item.title: 德国工会准备在工业部门薪酬谈判开始时举行罢工
item.description: 德国最大的工业工会 IG Metall 要求为该国汽车、电气和金属行业的近 400 万名工人加薪 7%，集体谈判已于周三开始。【原文：Germany's largest industrial union, IG Metall, demanded a pay rise of 7% for almost four million workers in the country's auto, electrical and metal industries as collective bargaining talks got under way on Wednesday.】

item.title: 摩根大通着眼于瑞士企业业务收益和区块链发展
item.description: 摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase）的一位高管表示，摩根大通希望发展其在瑞士的企业银行业务，并希望利用区块链服务来帮助赢得客户。【原文：JPMorgan Chase wants to grow its Swiss corporate banking business and hopes to use blockchain services to help gain clients, an executive at the U.S. bank said.】

item.title: 边疆航空公司因运力增长放缓而上调利润率预期
item.description: 美国低成本航空公司边疆航空公司（Frontier Airlines）周三表示，由于运力削减抵消了国内旅游需求放缓的影响，该公司预计第三季度的利润率将比之前的预测有所提高。【原文：Frontier Airlines expects its third-quarter margins to improve compared to prior forecast as capacity cuts offset the impact of moderating domestic travel demand, the low-cost U.S. carrier said on Wednesday.】

item.title: Stellantis 将向密歇根工厂投资超过 4.06 亿美元，大力发展电动汽车和混合动力汽车
item.description: Stellantis 公司周三表示，它将在密歇根州的三家工厂投资超过 4.06 亿美元，用于开发电动汽车和混合动力汽车的共享平台。【原文：Stellantis said on Wednesday it would invest more than $406 million in three facilities in Michigan to develop a platform that can be shared for both electric and hybrid vehicles.】

item.title: 道明银行被美国联邦消费者保护委员会勒令就消费者信用报告支付 2800 万美元
item.description: 道明银行周三被美国监管机构勒令支付近 2800 万美元，原因是该银行多次与信用报告机构共享其客户的不准确负面信息，从而可能损害客户的信用评分。【原文：TD Bank was ordered by a U.S. regulator on Wednesday to pay nearly $28 million for repeatedly sharing inaccurate, negative information about its customers with credit reporting agencies, potentially tarnishing customers' credit scores.】

item.title: Adobe 将于今年晚些时候推出生成式人工智能视频创作工具
item.description: Adobe 软件制造商本周三表示，将在今年晚些时候限量发布一款新的人工智能生成视频创作和编辑工具，以加强其面向创意专业人士的应用软件套件。【原文：Adobe will unveil a new generative AI-powered video creation and editing tool in a limited release later this year, the software maker said on Wednesday, as it looks to beef up its suite of applications catering to creative professionals.】

item.title: Boohoo 的 prettylittlething 在节假日前恢复免费退货服务
item.description: Boohoo旗下在线时装零售商prettylittlething.com的回归老板将在假日季前恢复免费退货，接受被普遍认为是提高竞争力所必需的利润损失。【原文：The returning boss of Boohoo-owned online fashion retailer prettylittlething.com is bringing back free returns ahead of the holiday season, accepting a drain on profitability widely viewed as necessary to be competitive.】

item.title: VIEW 8月CPI小幅上涨，下周降息25个基点
item.description: 美国 8 月份消费者价格小幅上涨，但基本通胀率显示出一定的粘性，这可能会阻碍美联储下周降息半个百分点。【原文：U.S. consumer prices rose marginally in August, but underlying inflation showed some stickiness, which could discourage the Federal Reserve from delivering a half-point interest rate cut next week.】

item.title: 美联储下周将下调政策利率 25 个基点
item.description: 交易员们周三押注，美国央行行长下周可能会开始一系列降息行动，降息幅度为四分之一个百分点，因为政府数据显示 8 月份通胀率较上年同期有所下降，但衡量潜在通胀率的指标仍保持稳定。【原文：U.S. central bankers will likely start a series of interest-rate cuts next week with a quarter-of-a-percentage point reduction, traders bet on Wednesday, as government data showed inflation cooled in August from a year earlier, but a measure of underlying inflation remained sticky.】

item.title: 收入下降引发扭亏为盈疑虑，Meme 股票 GameStop 大跌
item.description: 游戏零售商 GameStop 的股价在周三的盘前交易中暴跌了 10%，该公司是一只广受关注的 "备忘录股"，此前该公司公布的季度收入降幅更大，令人质疑其重振业务的能力。【原文：Shares of GameStop , a widely watched meme stock, tumbled 10% in premarket trading on Wednesday after the video game retailer reported a bigger drop in quarterly revenue, questioning its ability to revitalize its business.】

item.title: 美国 8 月份居民消费价格温和上涨
item.description: 美国 8 月份消费者价格小幅上涨，但基本通胀率显示出一定的粘性，这可能会阻碍美联储下周降息半个百分点。【原文：U.S. consumer prices rose marginally in August, but underlying inflation showed some stickiness, which could discourage the Federal Reserve from delivering a half-point interest rate cut next week.】

item.title: 投资者权衡高管们的悲观前景，美国银行延续跌势
item.description: 美国银行股周三在收盘前下跌，延续了在高管们警告投资银行业务复苏慢于预期以及即将到来的降息预期将打击利息收入之后开始的抛售。【原文：U.S. bank stocks fell before the bell on Wednesday, extending a sell-off that started after executives warned of a slower-than-expected recovery in investment banking and the expected hit to interest income from looming rate cuts.】

item.title: 巴菲特的伯克希尔公司最新出售价值 2.287 亿美元的美国银行股票
item.description: 沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）的伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway）出售了价值 2.287 亿美元的美国银行股票，该企业集团继续削减其在这家美国第二大贷款机构的股份。【原文：Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway has sold shares worth $228.7 million in Bank of America , as the conglomerate continues to trim its stake in the second-largest U.S. lender.】

item.title: 泰坦尼克号造船厂哈兰德与沃尔夫首席财务官辞职
item.description: 陷入困境的英国造船商 Harland & Wolff 周三表示，其首席财务官 Arun Raman 已辞职，并立即生效。【原文：Struggling British shipbuilder Harland & Wolff said on Wednesday its Chief Financial Officer Arun Raman has resigned with immediate effect.】

item.title: Hazeltree 报告称，卖空者押注航空公司和银行
item.description: 数据和技术公司 Hazeltree 周三发布的一份报告显示，由于受盈利下降和价格上涨困扰的航空业悲观情绪加重，8 月份做空者将目光投向了航空公司。【原文：Shortsellers had their sights on airlines in August, as pessimism towards a sector plagued by earnings declines and price rises grows, a report by data and tech firm Hazeltree on Wednesday showed.】

item.title: 独家消息消息人士称，意大利联合信贷银行首席执行官与德国商业银行接洽，探讨合并事宜
item.description: 一位知情人士告诉路透社，意大利联合信贷银行首席执行官 Andrea Orcel 周三早些时候与德国商业银行管理层进行了接触，邀请该行探讨合并谈判事宜。【原文：UniCredit CEO Andrea Orcel approached German lender Commerzbank's management earlier on Wednesday inviting the bank to explore merger talks, a source with knowledge of the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 研究称，无排放卡车价格需下降 50%，才能与柴油车竞争
item.description: 咨询公司麦肯锡周三发表的一份研究报告称，无排放卡车的价格需要下降一半之多，才能成为柴油车型的经济型替代品，这是帮助实现欧盟气候目标的必要步骤。【原文：Prices of emissions-free trucks need to fall by as much as half to make them an affordable alternative to diesel models, a study by consultancy firm McKinsey published on Wednesday said, a necessary step to help achieve European Union climate targets.】

item.title: 中国将出台广泛措施完善保险业、防范风险
item.description: 中国国务院周三发表声明称，将出台具体指导意见，加强监管，防范中国保险业风险。【原文：China's state council on Wednesday said it will issue concrete guidelines to strengthen supervision and prevent risks in the country's insurance industry, according to a statement.】

item.title: 瑞银誓言在瑞士维持超过 4000 亿美元的贷款量
item.description: 瑞士联合银行（UBS）的一位高管周三表示，该行将继续向其国内市场提供约 3,500 亿瑞士法郎（约合 4,140 亿美元）的贷款，驳斥了该行可能削减国内贷款量的猜测。【原文：UBS will continue to provide around 350 billion Swiss francs ($414 billion) of loans to its home market, a senior executive at the Swiss bank said on Wednesday, countering speculation it could trim domestic loan volumes.】

item.title: 由于需求稳定，Dollarama 公布季度销售额上升
item.description: Dollarama 周三公布第二季度销售额增长，原因是厌倦通货膨胀的顾客纷纷到其折扣店购买低价必需品，如日用品。【原文：Dollarama reported a rise in second-quarter sales on Wednesday, as inflation-weary customers rallied at its discount stores to shop for low-priced essentials such as groceries.】

item.title: 曼联连续五年财务亏损
item.description: 曼联周三报告了更大的年度净亏损，这是这家英格兰俱乐部连续第五年出现财务亏损，并表示本财年的核心利润可能会因重组措施而降低。【原文：Manchester United on Wednesday reported a bigger annual net loss, marking the fifth consecutive year of financial losses for the English club, and said core profit this financial year could be lower due to its restructuring initiatives.】

item.title: 总统辩论后哈里斯获胜押注上升，美国加密货币股下跌
item.description: 在民主党候选人卡马拉-哈里斯（Kamala Harris）在一场激烈的总统辩论中让她的共和党对手唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）处于守势之后，美国加密货币股票在周三的盘前交易中下跌。【原文：U.S. cryptocurrency stocks fell in premarket trading on Wednesday after Democratic candidate Kamala Harris put her Republican rival Donald Trump on the defensive in a combative presidential debate.】

item.title: 啤酒市场份额被硬苏打水抢走，美国大麦种植者陷入困境
item.description: 唐-尼加德（Don Nygaard）是北达科他州一个偏远角落的第三代农民，他曾经为拉尔麦芽公司（Rahr Malting Corporation）种植大麦，用于酿制啤酒、淡啤酒和IPA。【原文：Don Nygaard, a third-generation farmer in a remote corner of North Dakota, used to grow malt barley for Rahr Malting Corporation to make into lagers, pale ales and IPAs.】

item.title: Zara 将于十月在美国提供二手服装服务
item.description: Zara 的所有者 Inditex 周三表示，Zara 将于 10 月底前在美国提供出售、维修或捐赠二手衣物的服务，以此延长衣物的生命周期，减少浪费。【原文：Zara will offer its service for selling, repairing or donating secondhand clothes in the United States by the end of October as a way of prolonging their life cycle and reducing waste, its owner Inditex said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 早间竞标迅速改变通胀观察
item.description: Dhara Ranasinghe 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天。【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets by Dhara Ranasinghe.】
